item.title: Former Gemini and Kraken Executives Appointed as CEO of Crypto Innovation CouncilAs reported by Cointelegraph, former Gemini and Kraken executive Ji Hun Kim has been appointed CEO of the Crypto Council for Innovation. Previously, he served in the role on an interim basis. [Foresight News]

Previously, he served in the role on an interim basis.

item.title: Windtree 计划融资 5.20 亿美元，以加强其 BNB 储备策略US-listed company Windtree (WINT) has signed a common stock purchase agreement for up to $500.00M to establish an equity line of credit and strengthen its BNB reserve strategy. In addition, the company has entered into an additional $20.00M stock purchase agreement with Build and Build. 99% of the proceeds will be used to acquire BNB. The equity line of credit may not be used until the company obtains shareholder approval to increase the authorized share capital of common stock. [Foresight News]

item.title: Beijing Haidian District Financial Administration: Beware of illegal fundraising activities carried out in the name of stablecoinsThe Haidian District Local Financial Supervision and Administration Bureau of Beijing issued an announcement stating that recently, digital currencies represented by stablecoins have received widespread attention in the market. Some illegal institutions use "financial innovation" and "digital assets" as gimmicks, and take advantage of the public's lack of understanding of stablecoins to absorb funds by issuing so-called "virtual currencies," "virtual assets," and "digital assets," inducing the public to participate in trading and speculation, disrupting economic and financial order, and breeding illegal fundraising, gambling, fraud, pyramid schemes, money laundering and other illegal and criminal activities, which seriously endanger the safety of the public's property. [Wu Blockchain]

item.title: REX Shares Adds JitoSOL to its Solana Staking ETF PortfolioAsset management firm REX Shares has included Solana ecosystem liquid staking token JitoSOL in its REX-Osprey Solana + Staking ETF (SSK) portfolio. This upgrade aims to expand the ETF's access to native staking rewards while ensuring liquidity, transparency, and ease of trading through traditional brokerage accounts. [Foresight News]

item.title: BitMEX co-founder Arthur Hayes purchased $1.00M ENA in the past 7 hours.According to Ember Monitoring, BitMEX co-founder Arthur Hayes has once again purchased $1.00M worth of ENA through various channels in the past 7 hours. He transferred 500,000.00 USDC to Binance and withdrew 1.08M ENA; transferred 250,000.00 USDC to Galaxy Digital and withdrew 560,000.00 ENA; and transferred 250,000.00 USDC to Flowdesk and withdrew 520,000.00 ENA. [Foresight News]

item.title: Bloomberg: White House to Allow 401(k) Investments in Crypto, Blackstone Expects Large Private Equity Firms to Dominate MarketChainCatcher News, according to Bloomberg, the White House is preparing an executive order that will provide legal protection for 401(k) retirement plan managers, allowing them to include private market funds, cryptocurrencies, and other alternative assets in their investment options. Blackstone Inc. President Jon Gray said that once the U.S. paves the way for 401(k) plans to expand into investment areas beyond stocks and bonds, leading institutions in the alternative asset industry will be the most likely to benefit. This move will bring significant changes to the U.S. retirement savings market, providing ordinary investors with more diversified investment channels, and may also create new business growth opportunities for large private equity management companies. [ChainCatcher]

His losses on PUMP have now exceeded $10.00M, including spot losses of $2.17M and contract losses of $8.14M. [Foresight News]

item.title: A certain whale reduced its holdings by 3,459 ETH 11 hours ago, with a loss of $35,000.0.On July 25, according to on-chain analyst AI Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa)'s monitoring, swing trading whale 0x54d...e6029 reduced its holdings by 3,459 ETH (approximately $12.58M) 11 hours ago. This whale established a position of 5,557 ETH (worth $20.27M) on 07.23 at an average price of $3,648.50; this reduction in holdings resulted in a slight loss of $35,000.00, and the remaining portion is still staked in ether.fi. The win rate for the two swing trading operations since June 20 has remained at 100.00%. [Techflow]

item.title: Christie's International Real Estate Launches New Division to Handle Real Estate Transactions with CryptocurrencyAccording to The New York Times, Christie's International Real Estate will establish a new department to handle real estate transactions using cryptocurrencies. The team consists of lawyers, analysts, and cryptocurrency experts, specializing in transactions where both buyers and sellers use only digital currencies and do not rely on banks at all. [Foresight News]
item.description: 54 minutes agoForesightNewsChristie's International Real Estate Launches New Division to Handle Real Estate Transactions with CryptocurrencyAccording to The New York Times, Christie's International Real Estate will establish a new department to handle real estate transactions using cryptocurrencies.

item.title: "Truth Collective" reappears after six months, transferring $7.24M worth of ZEREBRO and FARTCOINAccording to Arkham monitoring, after six months, truth terminal: Squads Vault "truth collective" transferred 40,000,000 ZEREBRO and 4,300,000 FARTCOIN out at 5:11 UTC+8 today, totaling $7,240,000.00; currently stored in the new address: Co7xwX…BTv9TN. In January of this year, truth terminal: Squads Vault "truth collective" transferred 6,750,000 FARTCOIN and 8,250,000 FARTCOIN to Wintermute Deposit and Fireblock Custody, respectively, with a total value of $24,600,000.00 at that time. [Wu Blockchain]

item.title: Injective announces tokenization and on-chain listing of Ethereum treasury company SharpLink's stock (SBET)On July 25, according to The Block, the blockchain project Injective announced that it will tokenize and put on-chain the shares (SBET) of Ethereum vault company SharpLink, founded by Joe Lubin, to create the "first tokenized digital asset vault" (DAT). The project utilizes Injective's iAssets framework to transform static company Ethereum reserves into yield-generating on-chain tools, supporting functions such as lending markets, collateral, and derivatives. SharpLink currently holds approximately $1.30B worth of Ethereum (360,807 ETH) and is the second-largest Ethereum vault company. [Techflow]

item.title: xAI to Integrate its Grok Conversational Model into Prediction Market KalshiElon Musk's xAI will integrate its Grok conversational model into the prediction market Kalshi. Before making predictions, Kalshi users can query the Grok large language model to obtain on-chain data, historical odds, and the latest headline information. [Foresight News]

item.title: CICC: Stablecoins have the potential to become a new type of infrastructureAccording to Zhitong Finance, a research report by CICC states that stablecoins have the potential to become a new type of infrastructure. By analyzing the incentive compatibility mechanisms of various participants in stablecoins, the report envisions the potential impact of stablecoins on financial markets and the international monetary system, and further explores China's response. We believe that the nascent stage of infrastructure is an important development opportunity, and issuing offshore RMB stablecoins may be China's preferred choice for participating in stablecoin development. However, it should be noted that stablecoins are only a "technique" for promoting the internationalization of the RMB. Whether the RMB can become a widely trusted international currency ultimately depends on the "principles," namely the "legal anchor" and "functional anchor" of the RMB. [Foresight News]

[Wu Blockchain]

item.title: Ripple co-founder-related addresses transferred approximately $140.00M worth of XRP to trading platforms in the past 7 days.According to on-chain investigator ZachXBT, since July 17, an address long associated with Ripple co-founder Chris Larsen has transferred 50,000,000 XRP. The wallet appears to have transferred approximately $140,000,000.00 worth of tokens into three addresses associated with trading platforms, while another 10,000,000 XRP were deposited into two newly created wallets. Addresses controlled by Chris Larsen still hold approximately 2,810,000,000 XRP, worth about $9,000,000,000.00. Previously, the SEC accused Ripple's CEO Brad Garlinghouse of personally cashing out $150,000,000.00 worth of XRP over three years when it sued Ripple in 2020. In addition, Larsen and his spouse sold $450,000,000.00 worth of tokens between 2017 and 2020. [Foresight News]
item.description: 1 hour agoForesightNewsRipple co-founder-related addresses transferred approximately $140.00M worth of XRP to trading platforms in the past 7 days.According to on-chain investigator ZachXBT, since July 17, an address long associated with Ripple co-founder Chris Larsen has transferred 50,000,000 XRP.
